channel.title: Denys Dovhan
channel.description: I'm developer • Student • Speaker • Author • Guitar player • Open Source addict
channel.author: Denys Dovhan

item.title: Why I use Atom instead of X
item.description: Many people ask me: “Why do you prefer Atom instead of Sublime Text? Why did you switch your primary text editor?” And every time I have to explain these reasons, again and again. That’s why I’m writing this post.
item.dc:creator: Denys Dovhan

item.title: NodeSchool Chernivtsi #2
item.description: A week ago we had our second NodeSchool event in Chernivtsi! In this post I’m gonna tell you how it was, what was better and what was worse.
item.dc:creator: Denys Dovhan

item.title: bash-handbook got 200 ★’s on GitHub
item.description: About month ago, in New Year night, I started to write my first handbook — the bash-handbook.
item.dc:creator: Denys Dovhan

item.title: 48th week
item.description: Nothing matter happened. You may not read this, because this week was so boring. This post mostly contains my github activity for this week and nothing else. No wiki, no news, no tweets.
item.dc:creator: Denys Dovhan

item.title: 47th week
item.description: Cool wiki-articles. Cool cover. Cool projects. Cool trip to Lviv. Take a look how I spent this week!

item.title: 45th week
item.description: This post is an attempt to sum up all these things that happened last week in more public form. I mean, here are links for interesting things, funny gifs, my conclusions and other.

item.title: Web Space on the stage
item.description: I published small video a week ago. This video about my new project with Codeguida called Web Space — that’s the first Ukrainian screencasts about modern web-technologies.

item.title: Building pull requests differently using Travis CI
item.description: Sometimes you need to run differently tests for pull requests on Travis CI. In this post I’m going to explain how you can do this.
